text: Michael Alfred Gartner (born October 29, 1959) is a retired Canadian professional ice hockey player. He played 19 seasons in the National Hockey League. In 2017 Gartner was named one of the '100 Greatest NHL Players' in history. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players Category:Washington Capitals players Category:New York Rangers players Category:Phoenix Coyotes players Category:Hockey Hall of Fame inductees Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:World Hockey Association players Category:Ontario Hockey League players
title: Mike Gartner
